1.12.2.Alpha1:
The first ever alpha release of the Carpet Mod port to Forge is out! (Please ignore the mod version in game.)
 This is an alpha release so don't be surprised to see any Crashes/Bugs.
1.12.2.Alpha2:
Alpha2 is out and i would say we are quite close to the stable state :)
Might be another alpha3 though, but the last one.
1.12.2.1.0.0:
Full Release!
Added Server-Side support.
Completely ripped off the old Mod Options menu, all carpet rules can now be handled using the /carpet command similar to carpetmod.
This version is not compatible with liteloader
1.12.2.1.1.0: v1.1.0 is out and with it comes lots of crash fixes and Liteloader compatibility!
1.12.2.1.1.1: Fixed crash with forge only clients
1.12.2.1.1.2: Fixed items not stacking and causing a huge amount of lag especially in farms
1.12.2.1.2.0:
v1.2.0 is now out!
With it comes a bunch of bugfixes, features and a way smoother game experience ;)
1.12.2.1.2.1:
v1.2.1 is here.
Includes a few bug and crash fixes, farmLandBug (from Carpetmod1.12.2) and CtrlQ Crafting works with recipe books now.
1.12.2.1.3.0:
v1.3.0 is here! Fake players are here!
Client-server rules are now synced. Major changes to how we make use of mixins, the mod should be a lot more compatible with other mods now.
Also added some other new carpet rules (and removed two), check the complete changelog over at curseforge/github.
